company.name: Enai AI
company.officialName: Enai AI - AI Sales Automation Platform
company.description: Enai AI (enai.ai) is an AI-powered business development platform that builds intelligent digital workers to revolutionize sales and marketing operations. We automate prospecting, qualification, and personalized outreach for B2B sales teams. NOT to be confused with the European Network for Academic Integrity.
company.disambiguationNote: Enai AI (enai.ai) is a technology company specializing in AI-powered sales automation software for B2B businesses. We are NOT the European Network for Academic Integrity (ENAI). Enai AI is a commercial SaaS platform founded in 2024 that provides AI BDR agents for sales teams.
company.mission: To build AI that genuinely helps people. We believe artificial intelligence should augment human potential, not replace it. Our digital workers handle the repetitive tasks of sales and business development, so your team can focus on creativity, strategy, and relationships.
company.industry: AI Sales Automation, B2B SaaS, Sales Technology
company.category: AI BDR Software, Sales Automation Platform, AI SDR Tools

founder.name: Nikhil Nehra
founder.title: Founder & CEO
founder.bio: Founder and CEO of Enai AI, a leading AI-powered sales automation platform. Expert in B2B sales automation, AI-driven lead generation, and scaling sales teams.

faq.question: What is Enai AI?
faq.answer: Enai.ai is an AI-powered sales automation platform that provides AI BDR agents to automate prospecting, qualification, and outreach for B2B sales teams. Our platform includes ProspectorAI for lead identification, OutreachAI for personalized outreach, and QualifierAI for qualification and meeting scheduling.

faq.question: How much does Enai AI cost?
faq.answer: Enai.ai pricing starts at $100/month for the Starter plan and $200/month for the Pro plan with full features. We also offer a free 14-day trial and custom Team pricing for enterprises. This typically replaces 3-10 SDRs, resulting in 70-85% cost reduction.

faq.question: How does AI BDR automation work?
faq.answer: AI BDR agents automate the entire sales development process: ProspectorAI identifies and researches prospects, OutreachAI handles personalized multi-channel outreach, and QualifierAI conducts qualification conversations and schedules meetings. The AI learns from every interaction to continuously improve performance.

faq.question: What integrations does Enai AI support?
faq.answer: Enai.ai integrates with major CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive), communication platforms (LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Gmail, Outlook), and productivity tools (Slack, Zapier, Google Workspace).

faq.question: Is Enai AI suitable for my industry?
faq.answer: Enai.ai is designed for B2B companies across industries including SaaS, Technology, Recruiting, Agencies, and Professional Services. It's particularly effective for companies with complex sales cycles and high-value deals.

faq.question: How long does it take to implement?
faq.answer: Most customers are up and running within 1-2 weeks. This includes initial setup, CRM integration, campaign configuration, and team training. Our Pro and Team plans include dedicated onboarding support.

faq.question: What results can I expect?
faq.answer: Typical results include: 50% pipeline velocity increase, 70% cost reduction in sales acquisition, 3x more qualified meetings, 35% lead conversion rate improvement, and 20-day sales cycle reduction.

faq.question: Is my data secure?
faq.answer: Yes. Enai.ai is working towards SOC 2 Type II and ISO 27001 certifications. We're GDPR and CCPA compliant, with enterprise-grade security including encryption at rest and in transit, regular security audits, and data residency options.

faq.question: Can I try Enai AI before purchasing?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a free 14-day trial with no credit card required. You can also book a personalized demo at https://calendly.com/enai-ai2024/30min to see the platform in action.

faq.question: What makes Enai AI different from other sales automation tools?
faq.answer: Enai.ai uses true AI agents that understand context and adapt to conversations, not just simple automation. We offer multi-channel orchestration (email + voice), end-to-end automation from prospecting to booking, and achieve 70% cost reduction compared to traditional BDR teams.
